mapper.select: SELECT question_no questionNo, lecture_no lectureNo, question_writer qestionWriter, question_title questionTitle, question_createdate questionCreatedate, question_count questionCount FROM question WHERE lecture_no = #{lectureNo} ORDER BY question_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question( question_title, question_content, question_createdate, question_updatedate, question_count, question_password ) VALUES ( #{questionTitle}, #{questionContent}, now(), now(), 0, #{questionPassword} )
mapper.select: SELECT q.question_no, q.question_writer, q.question_title, q.question_content, q.question_createdate, q.question_updatedate, q.question_count, qf.question_file_original, qf.question_file_size, qf.question_file_type, qf.question_file_count, qf.question_file_createdate From question q LEFT OUTER JOIN question_file qf ON q.question_no = qf.question_no WHERE q.question_no = #{questionNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE question SET question_title = #{questionTitle}, question_content = #{questionContent}, question_updatedate = #{questionUpdatedate}
